nodes.bodyText: @andreoss This name change input to input1 was intentional? If yes, please, add a better name than input1.
@andreoss Sorry, but isn't very clear why 1) Revert the  44540d94 commit and 3) Undo 1. Can you check it is correct and add more information to be clearer?

nodes.bodyText: @andreoss I'm not a big fan of that, it seems to be very dependent on the IDE you are using (IDEA I suppose?), not everybody is using that IDE, so as asked by @fabriciofx be clearer on the instructions and say with which IDE it is for.

nodes.bodyText: @victornoel @fabriciofx You are right. I reworded it in more general terms. And now it seems that the inlining approach is more convoluted, since it leaves behind many unwanted artifacts (wrong variable names, broken indentation, etc)

nodes.bodyText: @andreoss all of those should be transformed to use Assertion with Throws
@andreoss all of those should have a clear message in the form "Must..."
@andreoss Choose package and replace assertThat with Assertion. Have you already said it on the fist phrase? To me, it seems redundant.
